subject.normal: [Bug 515125] Re: I got an extern HDD 500 Go, but when I try to see what's in it, there is nothing... But when I access to it with the terminal, I can see all my files.

body.para: there's a disk error not a nautilus bug. try running fsck on the device. thanks.
** Changed in: nautilus (Ubuntu) Status: Incomplete => Invalid
body.footer:
-- I got an extern HDD 500 Go, but when I try to see what's in it, there is
nothing... But when I access to it with the terminal, I can see all my files. https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/515125 You received this bug notification because you are a member of Ubuntu Bugs, which is subscribed to Ubuntu.
